channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Innkeeper/The Landlord - Support/Support (50% credit to LOLZ1337)
channel.description:
> # [color = "steblue"] The Innkeeper [/color] :shield: > **[color = "steblue"] Blue Dragon Support Unique [/color]** **Focused (Passive)** - Cannot get Redirected or Occupied **Restock (Night)** - Cannot choose a player two times in a row (two night cooldown). Restore a use of ALL limited abilities on the target player. If the player did not use any limited abilities, the restock will NOT increase a use. - Infinite uses **Cozy Inn (Night)** - Anyone who visits you tonight will be healed and occupied and will receive a CW buff for the next night. You will know all visitors to you that night. If you are attacked by a visitor, all visitors will be notified of the attacker(s). - 3 uses *Defeat the Unseen or Cult and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> # [color = "purple"] The Landlord [/color] :shield: > **[color = "purple"] Unseen Support [/color]** **Poisoned Beverage (Passive)** - Any marked targets visiting you will be attacked. Bypasses death immunity **Shady Inn (Night)** - Anyone who visits you tonight will be healed and occupied but will receive incorrect feedback from ALL their night actions the next night. You will know everyone visiting you that night. Everyone visiting you will be marked. - 2 uses **Free Drinks! (Night)** - Force everyone marked to target you. - 1 use *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Innkeeper/The Landlord - Support/Support (50% credit to LOLZ1337)
item.dc:creator: Lej
item.description:
> # The Innkeeper
> Blue Dragon Support Unique
Focused (Passive) - Cannot get Redirected or Occupied
Restock (Night) - Cannot choose a player two times in a row (two night cooldown). Restore a use of ALL limited abilities on the target player. If the player did not use any limited abilities, the restock will NOT increase a use. - Infinite uses
Cozy Inn (Night) - Anyone who visits you tonight will be healed and occupied and will receive a CW buff for the next night. You will know all visitors to you that night. If you are attacked by a visitor, all visitors will be notified of the attacker(s). - 3 uses
Defeat the Unseen or Cult and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

> # The Landlord
> Unseen Support
Poisoned Beverage (Passive) - Any marked targets visiting you will be attacked. Bypasses death immunity
Shady Inn (Night) - Anyone who visits you tonight will be healed and occupied but will receive incorrect feedback from ALL their night actions
the next night. You will know everyone visiting you that night. Everyone visiting you will be marked. - 2 uses
Free Drinks! (Night) - Force everyone marked to target you. - 1 use
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Innkeeper/The Landlord - Support/Support (50% credit to LOLZ1337)
